title: The case of Anthony Earl of Shaftsbury as it was argued before His Majesties justices of the Kings Bench, Trin. Term., 29. Car. 2 : being upon his confinement in the Tower &c. : with a speech of this worthy Earl, pleading his own case, and the liberty of the subject.
author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
